title: Jacob Deceives Isaac
summary: Genesis 27 tells how Jacob, with Rebekah’s help, deceives his father Isaac to receive the blessing intended for Esau. This causes conflict and leads Esau to plan revenge, so Jacob is sent away.

faq.question: Why did Rebekah help Jacob deceive Isaac?
faq.answer: She believed Jacob was the chosen son and wanted him to receive the blessing.

faq.question: How did Esau react to the deception?
faq.answer: He was furious and planned to kill Jacob after their father’s death.
